title: Account Confusion
body: I recently tried logging into my account and it says its banned forever :\.... I went to check the email affiliated with my account and the email was not mine I have never seen it before. I don't know if my account got hacked and someone did something on it to get it banned or what but my username and password have not changed. I submitted a ticket days ago and I have gotten no response. Idk what to do I can make another account but I have put so much time and money into my main account.

replies.body:
We're pretty overloaded with tickets at the moment, but our specialists have shifted into overdrive and will get to you as soon as possible. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
I just want to know the chances of me getting my account back..
